about_the_game:
Welcome to Recycle Center Simulator: Prologue!
Dive into the world of sustainable resource management in Recycle Center Simulato: Prologuer, where you take charge of collecting, sorting, recycling, and selling materials to build a prosperous recycling enterprise.



Key Features:
  • Build and Manage Your Recycling Base: Start with a humble warehouse, your central hub for gathering and processing raw materials. Expand and upgrade your facilities to maximize efficiency and production.
  • Venture Beyond Your Base: Explore diverse locations outside your warehouse to collect recyclable materials. Receive tips and leads from online sources to uncover valuable resources, for which you pay a fair price.
  • Fulfill Online Requests: Engage with virtual clients online who contract you to gather specific quantities of materials. Negotiate prices to ensure a profitable deal and expand your business reach.
  • Employ a Skilled Workforce: Hire employees to assist with sorting and processing materials. Delegate tasks strategically to optimize workflow and increase productivity.
  • Dynamic Market Economy: Adapt to a fluctuating market where prices for materials change based on supply and demand. Stay competitive by adjusting your strategies and seizing profitable opportunities.



Become the Recycling Tycoon:
From a small-scale operation to a leading recycling powerhouse, every decision shapes your success in Recycle Center Simulator: Prologue. Contribute to environmental sustainability while growing a thriving business that turns waste into valuable resources.

Are you ready to transform trash into treasure and lead the way in eco-friendly entrepreneurship? Start your journey in Recycle Center Simulator: Prologue today!
detailed_description:
Welcome to Recycle Center Simulator: Prologue!
Dive into the world of sustainable resource management in Recycle Center Simulato: Prologuer, where you take charge of collecting, sorting, recycling, and selling materials to build a prosperous recycling enterprise.



Key Features:
  • Build and Manage Your Recycling Base: Start with a humble warehouse, your central hub for gathering and processing raw materials. Expand and upgrade your facilities to maximize efficiency and production.
  • Venture Beyond Your Base: Explore diverse locations outside your warehouse to collect recyclable materials. Receive tips and leads from online sources to uncover valuable resources, for which you pay a fair price.
  • Fulfill Online Requests: Engage with virtual clients online who contract you to gather specific quantities of materials. Negotiate prices to ensure a profitable deal and expand your business reach.
  • Employ a Skilled Workforce: Hire employees to assist with sorting and processing materials. Delegate tasks strategically to optimize workflow and increase productivity.
  • Dynamic Market Economy: Adapt to a fluctuating market where prices for materials change based on supply and demand. Stay competitive by adjusting your strategies and seizing profitable opportunities.



Become the Recycling Tycoon:
From a small-scale operation to a leading recycling powerhouse, every decision shapes your success in Recycle Center Simulator: Prologue. Contribute to environmental sustainability while growing a thriving business that turns waste into valuable resources.

Are you ready to transform trash into treasure and lead the way in eco-friendly entrepreneurship? Start your journey in Recycle Center Simulator: Prologue today!

name: Recycling Center Simulator: Prologue

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 x64 / Windows 11 x64
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-6700k or AMD Ryzen 3 1200X
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 960 4GB or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Probably needed...

short_description: Recycling Center Simulator: Prologue is a free business simulator game in which you make money from garbage. Collect raw materials for your recycling center from different locations, recycle them, make money by producing new products and improving your factory.
supported_languages:
English*, Polish, Turkish, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Dutch, Hungarian
*languages with full audio support
